description: Canvas at Sullivan Hills offers a functional open-concept floor plan with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. This executive townhome features a spacious kitchen with pantry, quartz counters, stainless steel appliances, large island, and a bright great room. Quality finishes include crown moulding, laminate flooring on the main, marble counters in all bathrooms, and a spa-inspired ensuite with double sinks. Enjoy the large rec room, inviting deck, walk-out patio, and fenced yard with irrigation. Additional highlights include a main floor powder, side-by-side garage, whirlpool washer/dryer, and roughed-in central vacuum. Close to schools, parks, and shopping. Book your private showing today!! The seller is highly motivated to sell.
